experiences.title: CPO
experiences.description: Aplikasi Super (www.superapp.id) by Nusantara Technology (www.nusantara.technology). Aplikasi Super is the first Indonesian consumer technology company that is backed by Y-Combinator; is a social commerce group buying by enabling community leaders to become retailers within their communities. We use technology to empower community leaders to become a self-made entrepreneur, by enabling them to sell various products to their communities.

education.school: Stanford University Graduate School of Business
